english_translation: When you lose and are hurt, don't fear, losing heart

kannada_original: ಇದೆ ಕಡಲು ಇದೆ ಬಯಲು ಗಿರಿಕಣಿವೆ ನೂರು.
english_transliteration: Ide kaḍalu ide bayalu girikaṇive nūru.
english_translation: There is the sea, there is the plain, a hundred mountain valleys.

kannada_original: ಇದರ ಆಸರೆ ಪಡೆಯೊ, ನಲಿಯೊ ಮನ ಬಂದಂತೆ !
english_transliteration: Idara āasare paḍeyō, naliyō mana bandaṁte !
english_translation: Take refuge in this, rejoice as the mind wishes!
Drive away your misery – Dear Rama.
